org.cyclops.cyclopscore.helper

Class ItemStackHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.helper.ItemStackHelpers

  • public final class ItemStackHelpers
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains helper methods for various itemstack specific things.

      • getSafeTagCompound

        public static net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound getSafeTagCompound(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack itemStack)
        Get the tag compound from an item safely. If it does not exist yet, it will create and save a new tag compound.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item to get the tag compound from.
        Returns:
        The tag compound.

      • spawnItemStackToPlayer

        public static void spawnItemStackToPlayer(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                          net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                          net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                          net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player)
        Spawn an entity in the direction of a player without setting a pickup delay.
        Parameters:
        world - The world
        pos - The position to spawn an
        stack - The stack to spawn
        player - The player to direct the motion to

      • hasPlayerItem

        public static boolean hasPlayerItem(net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player,
                                    net.minecraft.item.Item item)
        Check if the given player has at least one of the given item.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        item - The item to search in the inventory.
        Returns:
        If the player has the item.

      • getVariants

        public static java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> getVariants(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack itemStack)
        Get a list of variants from the given stack if its damage value is the wildcard value, otherwise the list will only contain the given itemstack.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The itemstack
        Returns:
        The list of variants.

      • parseItemStack

        public static net.minecraft.item.ItemStack parseItemStack(java.lang.String itemStackString)
        Parse a string to an itemstack. Expects the format "domain:itemname:amount:meta" The domain and itemname are mandatory, the rest is optional.
        Parameters:
        itemStackString - The string to parse.
        Returns:
        The itemstack.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the string was incorrectly formatted.

      • areItemStacksIdentical

        @Deprecated
public static boolean areItemStacksIdentical(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack a,
                                                         net.minecraft.item.ItemStack b)
        Deprecated. Use ItemStack.areItemStacksEqual(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack, net.minecraft.item.ItemStack) instead.
        If the given itemstacks are completely identical, including their stack size.
        Parameters:
        a - The first itemstack.
        b - The second itemstack.
        Returns:
        If they are completely equal.

      • getItemStackHashCode

        public static int getItemStackHashCode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Get a hash code would satisfy the requirements of Object.hashCode() if ItemStack.areItemStacksEqual(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack, net.minecraft.item.ItemStack) stood in for Object.equals(java.lang.Object).
        Parameters:
        stack - The itemstack.
        Returns:
        The hash code.

        public static boolean isValidCreativeTab(net.minecraft.item.Item item,
                                         @Nullable
                                         net.minecraft.creativetab.CreativeTabs creativeTab)
        If the given item can be displayed in the given creative tab.
        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        creativeTab - The creative tab.
        Returns:
        If it can be displayed.

      • getSubItems

        public static net.minecraft.util.NonNullList<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> getSubItems(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack itemStack)
        Get all subitems of an item. This is based on Item.getSubItems(CreativeTabs, NonNullList).
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The given item.
        Returns:
        The sub items.

      • getSubItemsIfWildcardMeta

        public static net.minecraft.util.NonNullList<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> getSubItemsIfWildcardMeta(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack itemStack)
        If the given stack has a wildcard meta value, return a list of all its subitems, otherwise return a list with as single element itself.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The given item.
        Returns:
        The sub items.
